attributes.name: Possible Okta DoS Attack v102.0.2
attributes.description: Detects possible Denial of Service (DoS) attacks against an Okta organization. An adversary may attempt to disrupt an organization's business operations by performing a DoS attack against its Okta service.
author: Elastic
attributes.query: event.dataset:okta.system and event.action:(application.integration.rate_limit_exceeded or system.org.rate_limit.warning or system.org.rate_limit.violation or core.concurrency.org.limit.violation)
attributes.setup: The Okta Fleet integration, Filebeat module, or similarly structured data is required to be compatible with this rule.
